Text: Anyone who downloads this should also download and watch Penn & Tellers Bullshit S08E10 - also available on this site - to see the other side of the argument

OMG - she talks about Homoeopathy too

2 nutty subjects for the price of one.

Homoeopathy has not got a shred of scientific evidence and was 'thought up' a a time when the height of good medical practice and hygiene was not spitting into your hand and wiping it on the patient.

how this person can call herself a 'doctor'... well it just amazes me
